title: Chickasaw National Recreation Area: Picnic Pavilion Reservations
body: Reserving a Picnic Pavilion       Picnic Pavilions Picnic pavilions at Veterans Lake and the Buckhorn area of Lake of the Arbuckles may be reserved for $30.00 a day. An additional Special Use Permit may be required for activities such as, weddings, structures, banners, entertainment, etc.  You may reserve and pay for the Veterans Lake and the Buckhorn Pavilions online or by calling 877-444-6777. Note: The Bromide Pavilion is not reservable for day-use.   Â     The Buckhorn and Veterans Lake pavilions provide excellent settings and facilities for group picnics and activities. NPS/Chickasaw National Recreation Area
